instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.emotion: Read each sentence clearly and naturally, following the emotion and tone provided. (The script is for reference; you don't have to read it exactly as written.)
instructions.language: Feel free to record in either Korean or English, whichever is more comfortable for you.
instructions.length: If the recording is less than 2 minutes and 30 seconds, TTS generation will not be possible.
instructions.lengthRecommendation: (Recommended recording time: 2 minutes 30 seconds to 3 minutes.)
instructions.retry: If you finish reading the script but haven't reached 2 minutes 30 seconds, you can continue reading from the beginning.
instructions.silence: Silent sections during recording will be automatically removed, so feel free to take your time.
